responses.invalidDate: Зазначена дата недійсна (наприклад, даного дня не існує)
responses.noComponentsCurrentTime: You must specify at least one time component to change. If you need the current time, use `/{{atCommand}}` without specifying any arguments
responses.noComponentsUnix: You must specify at least one time component to change. If you want to get the syntax for a UNIX timestamp, use `/{{unixCommand}}`
responses.ephemeralNotice:
The default value for the `{{ephemeralOption}}` option has changed, and because you did not provide it, this message is only visible to you.
To make your messages work the same as before (or to hide this message), there is a setting you can change via a different bot. Instructions on how to do that can be found in HammerTime's support server in <{{supportServerUrl}}> at {{faqMessageLink}}
